exceptions.tactic: intros T P H x Px.

original: intros T P H x Px. unfold iota. apply close_lim. - intros eps. exists x. intros y Py. apply H. apply (exist _ P y Py). - intros eps. exists x. intros y Py. unfold lim. apply (exist _ (fun A => forall z, P z -> A z)). intros z Pz. apply H. apply (exist _ P z Pz).
